Gadget Question
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Gadget Question
By Djinnmastr on Thursday, April 27, 2006 - 01:23 am:

Alright, probably a noob question. I'm in chapter 2, and just went on my first adventure there (and died, stupid rippers coming back to life with true grit and blocking every attack)

Anyway, i still only have 3 gadgets to use in shows for my four monsters. I bought (or thought i bought) a few others from the store, they were 1000g each in the second level of the industry place. I see them listed in my menu under gadget parts, but how exactly do i get to use them? I'm tired of my maya pretty much wasting its training

By RPGDesigner on Thursday, April 27, 2006 - 04:29 am:

Training Gadgets in this game are made up of three parts, the latter of them being optional; A Kit, a Geonyte Tank and a Prop.

In order to use the gadgets, you must put them together first. At the gadget shop, one of the options is "Combine". Combine at least a kit and a tank to make a gadget. Then you can assign them to your monsters. Assembly costs money, so watch what you choose.

Also, you can disassemble active gadgets at the shops, useful if you wanna slap on a better Geontye tank or add a prop. Seperation is free, but re-combining will cost you.
